org.pepstock.charba.client.callbacks

Interface Scriptable<T,C extends ChartContext>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of result of invocation method.
    C - type of context to pass to the callback.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AdjustScaleRangeCallback, AdjustSizeCallback, AlignCallback, AnchorCallback, AngleCallback, BarBorderWidthCallback, BaseCallback, BorderAlignCallback, BorderDashCallback<C>, BorderDashOffsetCallback<C>, BorderRadiusCallback, BorderSkippedCallback, CapStyleCallback<C>, ClampCallback, ClipCallback, ColorCallback<C>, ContentCallback, CornerRadiusCallback<C>, CountCallback, CubicInterpolationModeCallback, DelayCallback, DisplayCallback<C>, DisplayCallback, DrawTimeCallback, DurationCallback, EasingCallback, ElementAlignCallback<C>, EnableBorderRadiusCallback, FillCallback, FontCallback<C>, FromCallback, FullSizeCallback<C>, ImageSizeCallback, JoinStyleCallback<C>, LabelPositionCallback, LoopCallback, MaxTicksLimitCallback, MeterFormatCallback, ModeCallback, NumberFormatCallback, OffsetCallback<C>, OpacityCallback, PaddingCallback<C>, PaddingSizeCallback, PointStyleCallback, PositionCallback<C>, PrecisionCallback, RadiusCallback<C>, RenderCallback, RotationCallback<C>, ShowLabelBackdropCallback, SimplePaddingCallback, SteppedCallback, StepSizeCallback, TextAlignCallback<C>, TextCallback<C>, TextShadowBlurCallback, ToCallback, ValueCallback, WidthCallback<C>

    public interface Scriptable<T,C extends ChartContext>
    Interface to map all callback of scriptable options available for CHART.JS.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T invoke(C context)
      Returns the value of property at runtime.

    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        T invoke(C context)
        Returns the value of property at runtime.
        Parameters:
        context - context instance
        Returns:
        value of property to be applied
